Hero.title: Hello, my name is Alexandru Maftei
Hero.subtitle: I am a Frontend Developer skilled in modern web development and Java Spring, adept at creating responsive websites and ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend.

tab1.title: Top-Tier Service Excellence
tab1.description: I excel in developing user-friendly websites using advanced technology, providing dynamic and captivating user interactions.

second.description: Building robust, scalable web solutions with the latest technologies to deliver high-performance websites tailored to meet your business needs.

third.description: Maximizing your online visibility and driving targeted traffic to your site with customized Google Ads strategies.
